revision.text:
==Details== These are as of Version 0.5.8 ===Descriptions=== speedrun.com page will be linked here when it has been set up. Only Entries that qualify for the First place in the challenge will be saved and rest will be moved away to [[Speedruns#Record_History|Record History]]. Each of these categories will also have three forms, and 2 subcategories. Those being #Clickless% #Manual% #Autoclicker% With the 2 subcategories being X-Item% No X-Item% For the time being you can submit runs on the [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord], the leaderboards below will be updated once attempts are submitted, and confirmed by the community. If in Manual% your Click Per Second is above 15.5 CPS (Current World Record) your run may be disqualified unless you can provide proof that you have successfully surpassed that click speed, and in which case you will hold the actual Wolrd Record for Click Speed. Reminder that since the run timer doesn't start in Clickless% until you catch your starter, the 10 clicks required to get your starter do not count. ===Rules=== # Must have the video recorded in its entirety. # The run timer starts once you '''catch''' your starter. # Clock changes for Time based Pokémon is allowed. # Glitches may be used if they aren't otherwise specified. ===Other Specifications=== If you need to take a break you may but before you go onto break you must end on your stats screen, and continue from the stats screen once you come back. So as to prove no progress was made. Shiny% excludes the starter. Carpal Tunnel% must be ended on the statistics page so as to prove its 50,000 clicks. ===Current Records=== ====Clickless X-Item==== {| class="wikitable sortable collapsible" |- ! Category !! How to Finish !! Name !! Run Time
(MM:SS.MS) !! Date !! Link !! ==Details==
These are as of Version 0.5.8
===Descriptions===
speedrun.com page will be linked here when it has been set up. Only Entries that qualify for the First place in the challenge will be saved and rest will be moved away to [[Speedruns#Record_History|Record History]].
Each of these categories will also have three forms, and 2 subcategories.
Those being #Clickless% #Manual% #Autoclicker%
With the 2 subcategories being X-Item% No X-Item%
For the time being you can submit runs on the [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord], the leaderboards below will be updated once attempts are submitted, and confirmed by the community.
If in Manual% your Click Per Second is above 15.5 CPS (Current World Record) your run may be disqualified unless you can provide proof that you have successfully surpassed that click speed, and in which case you will hold the actual Wolrd Record for Click Speed.
Reminder that since the run timer doesn't start in Clickless% until you catch your starter, the 10 clicks required to get your starter do not count.
===Rules=== # Must have the video recorded in its entirety. # The run timer starts once you '''catch''' your starter. # Clock changes for Time based Pokémon is allowed. # Glitches may be used if they aren't otherwise specified.
===Other Specifications===
If you need to take a break you may but before you go onto break you must end on your stats screen, and continue from the stats screen once you come back. So as to prove no progress was made.
Shiny% excludes the starter.
Carpal Tunnel% must be ended on the statistics page so as to prove its 50,000 clicks.
===Categories===
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Category !! How to finish |- | [[Kanto]] Champion% || Beat Blue |- | Mew% || Catch Mew |- | Route 230% || Complete Route 230 |- | Shiny% || Catch 1 Shiny |- | [[Kanto]] Shiny Dex% || Catch every Shiny in Kanto |- | [[Kanto]] Dex% || Catch the Whole Kanto Dex |- | Millionaire% || Make {{pdollar}}1,000,000 |- | Shard% || Max 1 shard tree |- | Full Shard% || Max all shard trees |- | GodKarp% || Get Shiny Magikarp |- | Bidoof% || Get Bidoof |- | Carpal tunnel% || Click 50,000 Times |- | Egg% || Hatch 500 Eggs |- | Kanto Route% || Clear all Routes |- | Oakenshield% || Max an Oak Item |- | Oakenarmory% || Max all Oak Items |- | Tutorial% || Clear the Tutorial |- |} ===Current Records=== ====Clickless X-Item==== {| class="wikitable sortable collapsible" |- !
